model.name: transaction
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Transactions ( transactionId string PRIMARY KEY, transactionIdentifier varchar(200), transactionIdentifierType varchar(200), documentID varchar(200), documentType varchar(200), documentCountryISO3166Alpha3Code varchar(200), personBirthDate varchar(200), personCitizenshipISO3166Alpha3Code varchar(200), personGivenName varchar(200), personSurName varchar(200), personSexCode varchar(200) ) AS SELECT transactionId,transactionIdentifier,transactionIdentifierType,documentID,documentType,documentCountryISO3166Alpha3Code, personBirthDate,personCitizenshipISO3166Alpha3Code,personGivenName,personSurName,personSexCode FROM (EXEC ws.invokeHttp(action=>'GET', endpoint=>'/tx/CanonicalTransactionData?tid=1', stream=>'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/root' PASSING JSONTOXML('root', f.result) COLUMNS transactionId string PATH 'transactionId/text()', transactionIdentifier string PATH 'transactionIdentifier/text()', transactionIdentifierType string PATH 'transactionIdentifierType/text()', documentID string PATH 'documentID/text()', documentType string PATH 'documentType/text()', documentCountryISO3166Alpha3Code string PATH 'documentCountryISO3166Alpha3Code/text()', personBirthDate string PATH 'personBirthDate/text()', personCitizenshipISO3166Alpha3Code string PATH 'personCitizenshipISO3166Alpha3Code/text()', personGivenName string PATH 'personGivenName/text()', personSurName string PATH 'personSurName/text()', personSexCode string PATH 'personSexCode/text()') AS A;

model.name: flightdata
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW FlightData ( Id string PRIMARY KEY, Airline string, FlightNo string, PassportNo string, PassportCountry string, DepartLoc string, ArriveLoc string, TravelDate string, Name string ) AS SELECT SP.Id, SP.Airline, SP.FlightNo, SP.PassportNo, SP.PassportCountry, SP.DepartLoc, SP.ArriveLoc, SP.TravelDate, SP.Name FROM (EXEC file.getTextFiles('flight-data.txt')) AS f, TEXTTABLE(f.file COLUMNS Id string, Airline string, FlightNo string, PassportNo string, PassportCountry string, DepartLoc string, ArriveLoc string, TravelDate string, Name string HEADER) AS SP;

model.name: allpersondata
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PERSON ( Id string PRIMARY KEY, TransactionId string, FirstName string, LastName string, FullName string, Citizenship string, DateOfBirth string, Gender string, PassportNumber string, PassportCountry1 string, PassportCountry2 string, Airline string, FlightNo string, DepartureLocation string, ArrivalLocation string, TravelDate string ) AS SELECT I.Id, P.transactionId, P.personGivenName, P.personSurName, T.Name, P.personCitizenshipISO3166Alpha3Code, P.personBirthDate, P.personSexCode, P.documentId, P.documentCountryISO3166Alpha3Code, T.PassportCountry, T.Airline, T.FlightNo, T.DepartLoc, T.ArriveLoc, T.TravelDate FROM transaction.TRANSACTIONS P LEFT OUTER JOIN flightdata.FLIGHTDATA T WHERE P.documentId = T.PassportNo and P.documentType = 'P';
